description:
Learn how to heal yourself and others with this fabulous Reiki Level 1 Practitioner course, which covers:

Subtle Energies - This section lays a solid foundation for becoming an energy healer and covers how to see, read and heal the aura and you also learn about the chakras and how to clear, balance and re-energise them. This section also offers exciting exercises for energy perception.

Reiki Level 1 â€“ Solidify your foundation further by nurturing and healing yourself. Learn to integrate Reiki energy into your everyday life. You will receive your second attunement and learn the history of Reiki, basic anatomy and physiology, hand positions for self-healing and healing others, group Reiki, manifesting your goals and how the Antahkarana can increase your Reiki energy. You will also experience guided visualisations and meditations to deepen your intuition, peace and power.

Included in this course are comprehensive, high quality downloadable manuals, for you to keep and refer back to whenever necessary, as well as video lessons, and bonus Reiki music and meditation. Once you have completed viewing the videos and reading the manuals, you can contact the course instructor to arrange a mutually convenient date and time to receive your Reiki Level 1 attunement by distance.

If you are really diligent, you can complete this course within a week at the most.

Receive a beautiful PDF certificate on successful completion of this course and after receiving your attunement.
title: Reiki Level 1 Certification
